description.schinese: 普通难度，女骑士通关1次
description.tchinese: 普通難度，女騎士通關1次

description.schinese: 普通难度，小女巫通关1次
description.tchinese: 普通難度，小女巫通關1次

description.schinese: 普通难度，药剂师通关1次
description.tchinese: 普通難度，藥劑師通關1次

description.schinese: 普通难度，魔术师通关1次
description.tchinese: 普通難度，魔術師通關1次

description.english: Trade with the adventure Card Collector 2 times
Try the Witch Apothecary's potion 5 times
Eat the apple and collect the Witch's rewards
description.schinese: 吃掉苹果，领取女巫奖赏
description.tchinese: 吃掉蘋果，領取女巫獎賞

description.english: Do not skip any box and conquer the game
description.schinese: 不跳过任何宝箱并通关游戏
description.tchinese: 不跳過任何寶箱並通關遊戲

description.english: Defeat a boss with level higher than your's.
description.schinese: 击败等级比自己高1级或以上的任意boss
description.tchinese: 擊敗等級比自己高1級或以上的任意boss

description.english: Defeat any boss when you have only 1 health
description.schinese: 1点生命值获得任意boss战的胜利
description.tchinese: 1點生命值獲得任意boss戰的勝利

description.english: Defeat any boss when you have full health
Defeat any boss in the first turn
Defeat Perist in the first turn
Have more than 200 armor in a combat
description.schinese: 在战斗中拥有200点以上的护甲
description.tchinese: 在戰鬥中擁有200點以上的護甲

description.english: Use at least 30 cards in one turn
Conquer the game by deck with no more than 10 cards
description.schinese: 用不超过10张的牌组通关
description.tchinese: 用不超過10張的牌組通關

description.schinese: 战斗中装备至少7个装备
description.tchinese: 戰鬥中裝備至少7個裝備

description.english: Use spell card 21 times in a turn

description.schinese: 中毒/烧伤/寒冷/黏着其中一个达到999
description.tchinese: 中毒/燒傷/寒冷/黏著其中一個達到999

description.english: Defeat grandma in the first turn.
Clears stage with Sleeping Wind Knight(Hard)
description.schinese: 使用“沉睡的发条骑士”通关一次
description.tchinese: 使用“沉睡的發條騎士”通關一次

description.schinese: 使用“致命餐叉”通关一次
description.tchinese: 使用“致命餐叉”通關一次

description.schinese: 使用“弹簧拳套”通关一次
description.tchinese: 使用“彈簧拳套”通關一次

description.schinese: 使用“飓风法杖”通关一次
description.tchinese: 使用“颶風法杖”通關一次

description.schinese: 使用“冰焰火把”通关一次
description.tchinese: 使用“冰焰火把”通關一次

description.schinese: 使用“女巫扫帚”通关一次
description.tchinese: 使用“女巫掃帚”通關一次

description.schinese: 使用“美味食谱”通关一次
description.tchinese: 使用“美味食譜”通關一次

description.schinese: 使用“调合烧杯”通关一次
description.tchinese: 使用“調合燒杯”通關一次

description.english: Defeat the fat devil with Selected Recipes
description.schinese: 装备“美味食谱”时，击败胖恶魔
description.tchinese: 裝備“美味食譜”時，擊敗胖惡魔

description.english: Defeat foreign assassin with Fatal Fork on the first turn
description.schinese: 装备“致命餐叉”时，第一回合击杀异国刺客
description.tchinese: 裝備“致命餐叉”時，第一回合擊殺異國刺客

description.english: Defeat the Vampire Lord on the first turn
description.schinese: 第一回合击杀吸血鬼领主
description.tchinese: 第一回合擊殺吸血鬼領主

description.schinese: 使用“潜行者手套”通关一次
description.tchinese: 使用“潛行者手套”通關一次

description.schinese: 使用“考古工具”通关一次
description.tchinese: 使用“考古工具”通關一次

description.english: Take three monster abilities of the final boss to defeat Midas.
description.schinese: 携带三个最终Boss的怪物能力击败弥达斯
description.tchinese: 攜帶三個最終Boss的怪物能力擊敗彌達斯

description.schinese: 普通难度，契约师通关1次
description.tchinese: 普通難度，契約師通關1次

description.english: In addition to normal attacks, carry 4 identical cards
description.schinese: 携带4张相同卡牌（普通攻击，恶作剧除外）
description.tchinese: 攜帶4張相同卡牌（普通攻擊，惡作劇除外）

description.english: Trigger 10 prayer cards in a single turn

description.schinese: 普通难度，机械师通关1次
description.tchinese: 普通難度，機械師通關1次

description.english: Monsters have more than 8 points of vulnerability
description.schinese: 怪物拥有8点以上的易伤
description.tchinese: 怪物擁有8點以上的易傷

description.english: Gain 20 mana in a single turn
Defeat the boss without playing a card
Play your own turn 3 times in a row
description.schinese: 连续进行3次自己的回合
description.tchinese: 連續進行3次自己的回合

description.english: Kill Forest Spirit in the first turn
Complete the level on Nightmare difficulty with a movement
description.schinese: 携带一个乐章的情况下通关梦魇难度
description.tchinese: 攜帶一個樂章的情況下通關夢魘難度

description.english: Complete the level on Nightmare difficulty with 3 movements
description.schinese: 携带三个乐章的情况下通关梦魇难度
description.tchinese: 攜帶三個樂章的情況下通關夢魘難度

description.english: Clear with 3 different types of minions
description.schinese: 携带3种不同类型的随从通关
description.tchinese: 攜帶3種不同類型的隨從通關

description.schinese: 战斗前最大随从攻击达到100
description.tchinese: 戰鬥前最大隨從攻擊達到100

description.schinese: 战斗前最大随从攻击达到200
description.tchinese: 戰鬥前最大隨從攻擊達到500

description.schinese: 战斗前最大随从攻击达到400
description.tchinese: 戰鬥前最大隨從攻擊達到400

description.schinese: 战斗前最大随从生命达到100
description.tchinese: 戰鬥前最大隨從生命達到100

description.schinese: 战斗前最大随从生命达到500
description.tchinese: 戰鬥前最大隨從生命達到500

description.schinese: 战斗前最大随从生命达到1000
description.tchinese: 戰鬥前最大隨從生命達到1000

description.english: Clear with your level not exceeding 4
description.schinese: 等级不超过4的情况下通关
description.tchinese: 等級不超過4的情況下通關

description.english: Triple 2 times in the same turn
description.schinese: 在同一回合内进行2次三连
description.tchinese: 在同一回合內進行2次三連

description.english: Equip 4 pieces of equipment on 1 minion
description.schinese: 为同一个随从装备4件装备
description.tchinese: 為同一個隨從裝備4件裝備

description.schinese: 携带3个自然族通关难度10
description.tchinese: 攜帶3個自然族通關難度10

description.english: Clear with 3 Acolyte in your deck
Clear with 3 Alchemists in your deck
Clear Difficulty 10 with 3 Acolyte in your deck
Clear Difficulty 10 with 3 Alchemists in your deck
description.schinese: 携带3个炼金师通关难度10
description.tchinese: 攜帶3個煉金師通關難度10

description.english: Deal damage 100 times in a single battle
Complete 3 prayers that last for at least 2 turn in a single turn
description.schinese: 单回合完成3次1回合以上的祷告
description.tchinese: 單回合完成3次1回合以上的禱告

description.english: Complete 10 prayers that last for at least 2 turn in a single turn
description.schinese: 单回合完成10次1回合以上的祷告
description.tchinese: 單回合完成10次1回合以上的禱告

description.english: Get 10 Potions in a single turn
Deal 1000 damage in a single turn
Use 7 cards in a single turn
Spend 10 Movement in a single turn
Clear with only 1 Minion in your deck
description.schinese: 牌组只携带1个随从通关
description.tchinese: 牌組只攜帶1個隨從通關

description.schinese: 普通难度，调灵师通关1次
description.tchinese: 普通難度，調靈師通關1次

description.english: The amount of gold is greater than 200 when clearing the level.
Complete the game without getting a fairy blessing.
description.schinese: 不获得仙女祝福并通关游戏
description.tchinese: 不獲得仙女祝福並通關遊戲

description.english: Transform minions 10 times in one game
description.schinese: 一场游戏中累计变形随从10次
description.tchinese: 一場遊戲中累計變形隨從10次

description.english: More than 30 negative buffs on a single monster
description.schinese: 单个怪物身上的负面buff超过30点
description.tchinese: 單個怪物身上的負面buff超過30點

description.english: Clear the stage once with Horror Box
Clear the stage once with Poker Windmill
description.schinese: 使用“扑克风车”通关一次
description.tchinese: 使用“撲克風車”通關一次

description.english: Clear the stage once withStrange Wizard
description.schinese: 使用“奇异魔方”通关一次
description.tchinese: 使用“奇异魔方”通關一次

description.english: Clear Chapter 4 with White Bloom on any difficulty
description.schinese: 任意难度携带洁白花朵通关第四章
description.tchinese: 任意難度攜帶潔白花朵通關第四章

description.english: Clear Chapter 4 with Black Fruit on any difficulty
description.schinese: 任意难度携带漆黑果实通关第四章
description.tchinese: 任意難度攜帶漆黑果實通關第四章

description.english: Clear Chapter 4 with Wolf on any difficulty
description.schinese: 任意难度狼人通关第四章
description.tchinese: 任意難度狼人通關第四章
